title: Eco Bliss Bath
subtitle: Creation of automated tests with Cypress

content.text: For this project completed during my training, my main task was to automate, using Cypress, tests that had been conducted during a previous testing campaign. These tests included numerous functional tests, such as verifying the functionality of the shopping cart, login, etc. I also automated API tests and performed some security tests related to the Reviews section of the site.

The tests I conducted included simple smoke tests, such as verifying the presence of the Cart button. I also performed End-to-End tests, like simulating an order from login to adding items to the cart.
Below, you can see the list of all the test scripts created in Cypress, along with an example of one of the tests in action.
